spec_data.Name: ipa-pgothic-fonts
spec_data.Description:
IPA Font is a Japanese OpenType fonts that is JIS X 0213:2004
compliant, provided by Information-technology Promotion Agency, Japan.

This package contains Proportional Gothic (sans-serif) style font.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 05:53:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Japanese Proportional Gothic-typeface OpenType font by IPA
